text: I am a DevOps Engineer for Starbucks as part of the Cloud Foundation Services (CFS) team supporting multiple Starbucks products. My team is responsible for the installation, configuration, monitoring, analysis, maintenance, and technical support of the infrastructure platform. After separating from active duty Air Force service I got my start in engineering working on several government contracts moving my way from Java enterprise software development, to web development, to implementing continuous integration. I love the work I'm doing now and feel lucky to be where I am!
I'm also excited about helping to maintain the Software Engineering Daily open source community. Currently I am refactoring the CI/CD pipelines as well as improving developer experience.
